message.body: What is a gd day for you to come change the pump?
You meant you need to read instructions?
I sent you the link before to the program that has instructions
Ok.So what are you saying?I should read the instructions or look up the manual?
I need the instructions to do the repair. Its a program u can buy. You also need the parts
I can buy the parts.water pump cost 200.if the program costs more than 100 i might as well take it to the mechanic.I will let you know
